Title: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') in uptime-kuma.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.23.0 up to 1.23.6
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.23.0, all versions after 1.23.6
